players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Oh no, Alice is gone! We need to be careful and figure this out together. Who do you all suspect?"
You: "I'm shocked that Alice is dead. We need to discuss and share any suspicions we have."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "I am the detective, and I investigated Bob last night. He is the mafioso. Charlie is lying to frame me."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and she is mafioso. Bob is innocent. Vote Diana."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
